```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
```

```{r get_plot_type, cache = TRUE}

data(tips, package = "reshape")
 plotMatrix2 <- ggpairs(tips[,3:2], upper = list(combo = "denstrip"))
 getPlot(plotMatrix2, 1, 2)



```
